page.title: 08LIFESTYLES . ALLFREYS.
page.content: {ALLFREYS GUEST HOUSE,BOLNEY RD, {COWFOLD.}Allfreys caters for guests requiring Bed & Breakfast.The owners are Mr.&Mrs.Warren.The building is 400 years old and they have 2 acres of garden.Allfreys is open all the time except Christmas.At Easter you get a chocolate egg with your breakfast.The house can take 12 guests at a time. Many foreign visitors come and stay especially in the summer. The guesthouse is always full when there is Showjumping at Hickstead. Mrs.Warren rises at 6:30 and serves breakfast till 9:30.An English Breakfast is the most popular.To stay it costs Â£15.per night and Â£22 for a double room.Mrs.Warren enjoys running a guesthouse as there are always fresh people to meet.
